hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: How much will it cost to send this letter to ? over ez hangover remedy The scope for new advertising methods offered by this datais remarkable. For example, If Costa Coffee knows that the iPhone with MAC address A8-23-RR-XX usually stops in around 8 in the morning for a coffee and a croissant (don't forget, this technology could be extended into the stores themselves) is now heading to Pret for a morning pick-me-up, then they might pay to flash an advert on a relevant bin just as the A8-23-RR-XX is appraoching, reminding him of a loyalty scheme or a special offer.
